name: Transaction Set Trailer
purpose: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments (including the beginning (ST) and ending (SE) segments)

elements.name: Number of Included Segments
elements.description: Total number of segments included in a transaction set including ST and SE segments

elements.name: Transaction Set Control Number
elements.description: Identifying control number that must be identical to the control number in ST02
